name: Ode To Koi
description:
EXPERIENCE ACTUAL FEELINGS

This is a real nice game about you, your koi pond, and that troubled mind you've been hauling around. 

  • Keep all that stinky ol' junk out of your zen garden
  • Feed them there fish just a lil' bit-- but not toooo much
  • Rest your mind and get back to your nougat center
  • Uncover dope secrets under the cover of nasty nighttime

HOW DO?

  • Use the MOUSE and KEYBOARD or an XBOX CONTROLLER
  • Use LMB or A BUTTON to PICK UP / USE STUFF
  • Use RMB or B BUTTON to DROP IT

BUT WHY?

Started for the 72 Hour Extra Credits Game Jam #6  (Aug 21st -24th 2020). 

The theme was TAKE CARE as indicated by this meowser below:

DISCLAIMERS & ADDENDUMS

This was the first solo flight for @misterjsparkles, so don't hold the other lovely Sticky Biscuits accountable. They are fine people and everything here would be exponentially more enjoyable had they been involved. :)

Also, remind me to come back here and credit the creators of fonts / asset store stuff / etc. that I pilfered in order to jam this thing out, okay?
